name: udcp_State-based_binary
title: UDCP State-based Conflict Events
description: Number of state-based conflict event counts per 0.01 decimal degree grid cell using UCDP GED polygon 1.1. Definition of ucdp violence type can be found: http://www.pcr.uu.se/research/ucdp/definitions/

extract_types_info.sum: count of conflict events per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: ratio of count of conflict events to pixel count within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Croicu, Mihai and Ralph Sundberg, 2012, “UCDP GED Conflict Polygons Dataset”, Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University
